title: Harry Potter Book One
author: J.K.Rowling
summary: Harry Potter is a series of seven fantasy novels written by British author J. K. Rowling. The novels chronicle the live of a young wizard, Harry Potter, and his friends Hermione Granger and Ron Wesley, all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardy. The main story arc concerns Harry's conflict with Lord Voldemort, a dark wizard who intends to become immortal, overthrow the wizard governing body know as the Ministry on Magic, and subjugate all wizards and Muggles (non-magical people).

title: Demon Slayer Volume 10
author: Koyoharu Gotouge
summary: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cire his sister.

title: The Adventures Of Sherlock Holmes
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
summary: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes is a collection of twelve short stories featuring the famous detective Sherlock Holmes and his loyal friend Dr. Watson. Set in late 19th-century London, the book follows Holmes as he solves a series of complex and intriguing cases using his keen powers of observation and deduction.

title: The Basic Cook Book Guide
author: Lesley Pagett
summary: You'll learn everything you need to know to get started in the kitchen - from boiling rice and scrambling eggs too making stock and backing the perfect roast with gravy - as well as how to prepare the dishes your mother abd grandmother used to make.
